item.description: We will be doing an off leash hike exploring the trails next to the river in the woods and then going under the bridge to explore the rail trail on the Goffstown side of the rail trail.  There may be a few spots crossing a street where you may want to leash your dog depending on how far we go up the rail trail (and how good your dog obeys voice commands) but most of the time the dogs will be off leash.
item.how_to_find_us: We will meet at the end of the parking lot in front of the ice arena, further away from the ice arena closer to the bridge.

group.name: Human Soles & Doggie Paws Hikers & Walkers of Manchester, NH

item.name: Piscataquog River Park/Rail Trail Hike.
